programme.title: Crypto Crash
programme.desc: What was behind the collapse of crypto giant FTX? And what does it say about digital currencies, celebrity endorsements, and the collision of tech and finance?

programme.title: Stranded At The Border
programme.desc: In Real Life shows the reality at the U.S.-Mexico border, where people are living in dangerously poor conditions while seeking asylum.

programme.title: The Slavemaster
programme.desc: A father, husband and businessman by day transforms into a sadomasochistic by night. This veteran con-man lures unsuspecting women with a web of lies and empty promises only to trap them in a world of sex slavery and murder.

programme.title: An Opportunity To Kill
programme.desc: A wayward ex-marine drifts through central Oregon, off everyone's radar. He's homeless and forgotten about, committing petty crimes here and there, until one day he spots Amyjane and gets the urge to kill.

programme.title: A Treacherous Triangle
programme.desc: Two prominent doctors, two towns apart, are entangled in a passionate rivalry for the same woman's affections. When one loses, he exacts the ultimate revenge, hiring a friend to take out the opposition.

programme.title: Doctor Death
programme.desc: For more than a decade, a genius doctor with a homicidal hobby gets away with murder at hospitals across two continents. Cops race against incredible odds to track him down just before he takes his next job and kills…again.

programme.title: The Jigsaw Man
programme.desc: Terror strikes London, England as severed body parts start showing up at random locations across the countryside. Police must piece together the human jigsaw puzzle in order to track down the perpetrator, a common thug who's mastered the dark art of body dismemberment.

programme.title: Fit To Kill
programme.desc: A beautiful brunette is killed and left inside a burned out luxury car in the high desert. At first, it seems as though the perpetrators have gotten away with murder. As cops investigate the brutal homicide, they find a trail of missteps, which they trace back to two muscle-bound, married murderers.

programme.title: Redneck Retribution
programme.desc: A scorned mistress exacts the ultimate revenge, hiring a group of derelicts to kill the wife of her lover. When the heat comes, she plays the victim and denies any involvement, but no level of acting will allow her to escape the cold truth, the murder was caught on camera.

programme.title: Seduced To Death
programme.desc: An evil seductress targets two Georgia police, bleeding them dry, then killing them for their life insurance benefits. This black widow gets away with murder for years before law enforcement untangles her web of seduction and lies and brings her to justice.

programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Dead Ringer: Busting Escobar's Cartel
programme.desc: Bill Gately and the U.S. Customs Service discover the owner of a coin laundry is laundering large sums of cash through a bank that originates from Columbia. Gately learns that one of the sources of the cash is none other than Pablo Escobar. Gately goes undercover and uses the man as a Trojan Horse to purchase one ton of cocaine, and follows the drugs to its destination. Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

programme.desc: Powering Hollywood's flashiest films behind the scenes, stunt workers push for better - and safer - working conditions.

programme.title: Today As It Happened
programme.desc: What happened today? Find out as Scripps News gets you up to speed on the day's events that everyone is talking about.

programme.title: This is Iowa
programme.desc: The Room Where it Happens: A bowling alley where a 9-year-old rolls a perfect game, Carver Hawkeye Arena as Caitlin Clark wows crowds, a ballroom where fans mark the day the music died, and a therapy room where an injured teen learns to walk again.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Two serial killers whose chilling crimes left their communities devastated.

programme.title: FIXT: Veteran Faces Terrifying Decision
programme.desc: Andrew returned home from serving his country with a toothache so bad he covers his mouth out of habit. Mickey had forgotten how to smile after years of struggle with addiction and abuse. Will the FIXT team help them smile again?

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Rickwood
programme.desc: This is the story of the oldest professional ballpark in the U.S. and the determination of its home team, the Black Barons. The voice of Rickwood tells the tale of its pivotal role in The Negro League, Black history and its legacy in American sports.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero takes to the streets to quiz people on the wildest, wackiest news stories. In "Imagination Station," contestants answer questions for cash about witty co-workers, life-saving screenings and teaching telemarketers a lesson.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: From longboards to wool sweaters, these amazing creators make beautiful, functional pieces of art.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.desc: Dive into the Midwest's fried delights. From Friday night fish fries to tasty testicles and fried grilled cheese? Enjoy the area's most iconic and delectable crispy fried goodness.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: Costumes are a part of the fabric that makes up New Orleans. As three local designers will find out – nothing is easy in the Big Easy as they compete in creating one-of-a-kind costumes inspired by the Crescent City and the river that shapes it.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: All across this country, people are stepping up to help their communities in big and small ways. From nurses, veterans and firefighters, to teachers, neighbors, and strangers, every community has a hero.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: In this season's finale, Frank Nicotero finds a couple of good sports in New Orleans and Cincinnati. Watch as he revisits the most absurd moments from the first two seasons.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.desc: Why is Kansas City's fashion scene thriving? Craving a horchata latte? Best pizza on planet Earth? Local experts Jordan Gallant, Jasmine Green, and Aaron Rahsaan Thomas have all the answers, including where to go for a new hairstyle and a pep talk.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Veteran NYC Chef Ten Vong squares up against Jimmy's Famous Seafood rep Charlie Wickboldt. Watch these chefs transform their colorful careers into even more colorful plates. Who will find the tomato trophy at the end of the rainbow?

programme.title: The Spark
programme.desc: Erica Powell will not be slowed down. After cancer treatments as an infant left her legally blind, she is fueled to become a world-class athlete and a beacon of inspiration to others.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Ed and Day venture to Verona and explore “the spot that’s more than a dot.” The guys play pickleball, dine on BBQ, get creative with splatter paint, and finish the day with a brew.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Word is this surprising city has a literary speakeasy. Meet a father-daughter duo who is disrupting the local food scene. Explore a historic man cave and pluck fruit from a tree that grows lemons and oranges. Also: archery! And, pancakes!

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.desc: Local comedy duos debate the best po' boys in the city, get fit and flexible, discover vintage threads and more on two cheap "dates" in New Orleans.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: In this game show, comedian Frank Nicotero hits the streets to ask people questions inspired by the wildest news stories for a chance at winning a cash prize. These real-life stories with unreal outcomes will make you say, “Wait, What Happened?"

programme.title: News Fallback: Hour Long Docs
programme.desc: Long form storytelling from Very Local.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A man vanishes from a boarding house in 1988. The fight to find him uncovers one of the most shocking cases in Sacramento history and the surprising revelation of a grandmotherly-looking serial killer hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.desc: A horrific accident doomed Allison to a lifetime of pain and failed surgeries. In search of a brighter smile, Mar-cia’s seen half a dozen dentists, but remains unsatisfied. Can FIXT tech meet the needs of their deserving clients?

programme.title: KCCI Local News
programme.desc: Get the latest news and weather from KCCI.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.desc: Dedicated mom and nurse, Cleo, spends a day filled with surprises. This incredible mother has overcome obstacles no parent should have to face. Cleo and her sons cook up some quality time.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.desc: Join WNBA player and Olympian Angel McCoughtry as she shows us the people and places that put Baltimore on the map. From sailing the Chesapeake, to sampling street foods, McCoughtry pulls back the curtain on what makes the Charm City so special.

programme.title: Animals on the Farm
programme.desc: In this episode we go down on the farm to explore the science of the cow's 4-chambered stomach. Learn about the mysterious muscle disorder that makes certain types of goats faint. Plus, find out what horsepower really is.

programme.title: South America's Coolest Creatures
programme.desc: This show features some of the coolest creatures from the continent of South America. Find out how the Jaguar's jaws are able to crush bone. And why the Galapagos Tortoise can grow to nearly 1,000 lbs.

programme.title: Evolving Earth
programme.desc: Host Philippe Cousteau travels to Utah where scientists have discovered a massive amount of dinosaur bones. We also go to an area where dinosaur footprints have been preserved. Then we visit Hawaii and see how these islands evolved from volcanoes. Philippe then tours an old coal mine in Pennsylvania and explores the fascinating way fossil fuels were formed.

programme.title: Ocean Exploration
programme.desc: Host Philippe Cousteau visits the famous Woods Hole Oceanographic Institute and finds what discoveries they've recently made under the deep sea. Then we travel to the Florida coast where Philippe goes scuba diving to observe the health of their coral reefs. Then we go to Maui, Hawaii and explore the power of their massive waves with the help of a professional surfer.

programme.title: Creatures of North America
programme.desc: This show features some of the coolest creatures from the continent of North America. Find out how Canada Geese can fly over 600 miles in a single day. And how the Beaver is able to build dams stretching over 2,000 ft.

programme.title: Europe's Coolest Creatures
programme.desc: This show features some of the coolest creatures from the continent of Europe. Find out why the Mongoose is immune to cobra venom. And why 80% of the Dragonfly's brain is used to process what it sees.

programme.title: Oregon Coast
programme.desc: Jefferson Graham takes us on a photowalk through Oregon Coast

programme.title: Santa Fe, New Mexico
programme.desc: Jefferson Graham tours Santa Fe, New Mexico and shows us how to capture the best photos of the city's beautiful landmarks with your phone.

programme.title: Station Nightclub Fire
programme.desc: A survivor reflects on The Station nightclub fire on February 20, 2003 in West Warwick, Rhode Island. One hundred people died and more than 200 were injured. The fire was sparked by pyrotechnics that went off during metal band, Great White's performance. The episode looks at who did and didn't take responsibility for the fire and fire code safety measures that have changed since.

programme.title: Surfside Collapse
programme.desc: On June 24, 2021, the Champlain Towers South, a beachfront condominium in the Miami suburb of Surfside, Florida partially collapsed, killing 98 people. Family members of victims and a WPTV anchor reflect on the tragedy. The episode looks at changes in building codes and laws and research on saltwater corrosion.

programme.title: The Inside Story
programme.desc: In collaboration with "The Marshall Project." In-depth stories on criminal justice - including health care in prisons and jails, staff shortages and controversial forensic evidence.

programme.title: Crypto Crash
programme.desc: What was behind the collapse of crypto giant FTX? And what does it say about digital currencies, celebrity endorsements, and the collision of tech and finance?

programme.title: Stranded At The Border
programme.desc: In Real Life shows the reality at the U.S.-Mexico border, where people are living in dangerously poor conditions while seeking asylum.

programme.title: The Slavemaster
programme.desc: A father, husband and businessman by day transforms into a sadomasochistic by night. This veteran con-man lures unsuspecting women with a web of lies and empty promises only to trap them in a world of sex slavery and murder.

programme.title: An Opportunity To Kill
programme.desc: A wayward ex-marine drifts through central Oregon, off everyone's radar. He's homeless and forgotten about, committing petty crimes here and there, until one day he spots Amyjane and gets the urge to kill.

programme.title: A Treacherous Triangle
programme.desc: Two prominent doctors, two towns apart, are entangled in a passionate rivalry for the same woman's affections. When one loses, he exacts the ultimate revenge, hiring a friend to take out the opposition.

programme.title: Doctor Death
programme.desc: For more than a decade, a genius doctor with a homicidal hobby gets away with murder at hospitals across two continents. Cops race against incredible odds to track him down just before he takes his next job and kills…again.

programme.title: The Jigsaw Man
programme.desc: Terror strikes London, England as severed body parts start showing up at random locations across the countryside. Police must piece together the human jigsaw puzzle in order to track down the perpetrator, a common thug who's mastered the dark art of body dismemberment.

programme.title: Fit To Kill
programme.desc: A beautiful brunette is killed and left inside a burned out luxury car in the high desert. At first, it seems as though the perpetrators have gotten away with murder. As cops investigate the brutal homicide, they find a trail of missteps, which they trace back to two muscle-bound, married murderers.

programme.title: Redneck Retribution
programme.desc: A scorned mistress exacts the ultimate revenge, hiring a group of derelicts to kill the wife of her lover. When the heat comes, she plays the victim and denies any involvement, but no level of acting will allow her to escape the cold truth, the murder was caught on camera.

programme.title: Seduced To Death
programme.desc: An evil seductress targets two Georgia police, bleeding them dry, then killing them for their life insurance benefits. This black widow gets away with murder for years before law enforcement untangles her web of seduction and lies and brings her to justice.

programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. programme.desc: Jefferson Graham tours Santa Fe, New Mexico and shows us how to capture the best photos of the city's beautiful landmarks with your phone.

programme.title: Station Nightclub Fire
programme.desc: A survivor reflects on The Station nightclub fire on February 20, 2003 in West Warwick, Rhode Island. One hundred people died and more than 200 were injured. The fire was sparked by pyrotechnics that went off during metal band, Great White's performance. The episode looks at who did and didn't take responsibility for the fire and fire code safety measures that have changed since.

programme.title: Surfside Collapse
programme.desc: On June 24, 2021, the Champlain Towers South, a beachfront condominium in the Miami suburb of Surfside, Florida partially collapsed, killing 98 people. Family members of victims and a WPTV anchor reflect on the tragedy. The episode looks at changes in building codes and laws and research on saltwater corrosion.

programme.title: An Opportunity To Kill
programme.desc: A wayward ex-marine drifts through central Oregon, off everyone's radar. He's homeless and forgotten about, committing petty crimes here and there, until one day he spots Amyjane and gets the urge to kill.

programme.title: A Treacherous Triangle
programme.desc: Two prominent doctors, two towns apart, are entangled in a passionate rivalry for the same woman's affections. When one loses, he exacts the ultimate revenge, hiring a friend to take out the opposition.

programme.title: Doctor Death
programme.desc: For more than a decade, a genius doctor with a homicidal hobby gets away with murder at hospitals across two continents. Cops race against incredible odds to track him down just before he takes his next job and kills…again.

programme.title: The Jigsaw Man
programme.desc: Terror strikes London, England as severed body parts start showing up at random locations across the countryside. Police must piece together the human jigsaw puzzle in order to track down the perpetrator, a common thug who's mastered the dark art of body dismemberment.

programme.title: Fit To Kill
programme.desc: A beautiful brunette is killed and left inside a burned out luxury car in the high desert. At first, it seems as though the perpetrators have gotten away with murder. As cops investigate the brutal homicide, they find a trail of missteps, which they trace back to two muscle-bound, married murderers.

programme.title: Redneck Retribution
programme.desc: A scorned mistress exacts the ultimate revenge, hiring a group of derelicts to kill the wife of her lover. When the heat comes, she plays the victim and denies any involvement, but no level of acting will allow her to escape the cold truth, the murder was caught on camera.

programme.title: Operation Black Coral: Intercepting Caribbean Coke
programme.desc: Sarasota detective, Jim Sweeting, infiltrates the vicious Cuban cocaine pipeline controlled by the Medellin cartel. The agent re-invents himself and takes on an alias of a drug trafficker to collect evidence and break the back of the source. Along the way Sweeting enters a violent drugs and money world guided only by his wits and a trusted confidential informant. To bust the dealers and stay alive he must put in the performance of a lifetime or be exposed, and killed.

programme.title: Operation Dead Ringer: Busting Escobar's Cartel
programme.desc: Bill Gately and the U.S. Customs Service discover the owner of a coin laundry is laundering large sums of cash through a bank that originates from Columbia. Gately learns that one of the sources of the cash is none other than Pablo Escobar. Gately goes undercover and uses the man as a Trojan Horse to purchase one ton of cocaine, and follows the drugs to its destination. Along the way, the FBI bullies into the operation and loses the coke. Gately pulls out the stops to save his case and arrest those involved.

programme.title: Operation Wake Up Cafe: Illegal Betting In Jersey
programme.desc: Passaic County, New Jersey officer Julia Torres goes undercover to bust an illegal betting club entrenched in the Little Italy neighborhood. As a woman running the operation dominated by male wise guys, it's a constant juggling act to collect evidence while not being made as a cop. Along the way, Torres life-saving efforts on a small boy nearly expose her and the operation. She manages to record conversations and bring down the backroom gambling operation to the delight of neighbors who applaud her efforts.

programme.title: Animals on the Farm
programme.desc: In this episode we go down on the farm to explore the science of the cow's 4-chambered stomach. Learn about the mysterious muscle disorder that makes certain types of goats faint. Plus, find out what horsepower really is.

programme.title: South America's Coolest Creatures
programme.desc: This show features some of the coolest creatures from the continent of South America. Find out how the Jaguar's jaws are able to crush bone. And why the Galapagos Tortoise can grow to nearly 1,000 lbs.

programme.title: Evolving Earth
programme.desc: Host Philippe Cousteau travels to Utah where scientists have discovered a massive amount of dinosaur bones. We also go to an area where dinosaur footprints have been preserved. Then we visit Hawaii and see how these islands evolved from volcanoes. Philippe then tours an old coal mine in Pennsylvania and explores the fascinating way fossil fuels were formed.

programme.title: Ocean Exploration
programme.desc: Host Philippe Cousteau visits the famous Woods Hole Oceanographic Institute and finds what discoveries they've recently made under the deep sea. Then we travel to the Florida coast where Philippe goes scuba diving to observe the health of their coral reefs. Then we go to Maui, Hawaii and explore the power of their massive waves with the help of a professional surfer.

programme.title: Creatures of North America
programme.desc: This show features some of the coolest creatures from the continent of North America. Find out how Canada Geese can fly over 600 miles in a single day. And how the Beaver is able to build dams stretching over 2,000 ft.

programme.title: Europe's Coolest Creatures
programme.desc: This show features some of the coolest creatures from the continent of Europe. Find out why the Mongoose is immune to cobra venom. And why 80% of the Dragonfly's brain is used to process what it sees.

programme.title: Seduced To Death
programme.desc: An evil seductress targets two Georgia police, bleeding them dry, then killing them for their life insurance benefits. This black widow gets away with murder for years before law enforcement untangles her web of seduction and lies and brings her to justice.

programme.title: Operation Pisces: Money Laundering For The Medellin Cartel
programme.desc: DEA Agent JD Miller is laundering money for the Medellin cartel. He needs help with the sheer volume of cash pickups so he brings in veteran undercover operative Louis Diaz to manage the West Coast operations. Together, JD and Louis run a scheme that also funds the DEA's evidence building efforts against Colombian kingpin, Jose Lopez. When they have enough recorded conversations and seized evidence against the kingpin, they take down Lopez and unearth his sprawling criminal enterprise.
